heading: Cultist Refuge Dungeon Guide
content: Cultist Refuge is a quick dungeon you can unlock by completing the , and holds the useful . Once you unlock this dungeon, complete it right away for the extra Renown because you're already in the neighborhood. Even better, the fast completion time here makes it a great candidate for Nightmare Dungeons, so hang on to your Sigils! While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! This dungeon is not accessible until you cleanse out the evil in . This unlocks the Dungeon along with potential vendors and a waypoint. This can be done solo, but goes by quicker with a group of friends. Reviewed by
